openai-completion-model.name: OpenAI Completion Model
openai-completion-model.description:
A block that contains config for an OpenAI Completion Model.
Learn more in the [OpenAPI Text Completion docs](
    https://beta.openai.com/docs/guides/completion)
openai-completion-model.code_example:
Load a configured block:
```python
from prefect_openai import CompletionModel

completion_model = CompletionModel.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: CompletionModel
fields.description:
A block that contains config for an OpenAI Completion Model.
Learn more in the [OpenAPI Text Completion docs](
    https://beta.openai.com/docs/guides/completion)

openai_credentials.title: Openai Credentials
openai_credentials.description: The credentials used to authenticate with OpenAI.

model.title: Model
model.description: ID of the model to use.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: What sampling temperature to use. Higher values means the model will take more risks. Try 0.9 for more creative applications, and 0 (argmax sampling) for ones with a well-defined answer.

max_tokens.title: Max Tokens
max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion. The token count of your prompt plus max_tokens cannot exceed the model's context length. Most models have a context length of 2048 tokens (except for the newest models, which support 4096).

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: The suffix to append to the prompt.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The maximum time to wait for the model to warm up.

OpenAICredentials.title: OpenAICredentials
OpenAICredentials.description: Credentials used to authenticate with OpenAI.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: The API key used to authenticate with OpenAI.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Specify which organization is used for an API request.

openai-image-model.name: OpenAI Image Model
openai-image-model.description:
A block that contains config for an OpenAI Image Model.
Learn more in the [OpenAPI Image generation docs](
    https://beta.openai.com/docs/guides/images)
openai-image-model.code_example:
Load a configured block:
```python
from prefect_openai import ImageModel

image_model = ImageModel.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: ImageModel
fields.description:
A block that contains config for an OpenAI Image Model.
Learn more in the [OpenAPI Image generation docs](
    https://beta.openai.com/docs/guides/images)

openai_credentials.title: Openai Credentials
openai_credentials.description: The credentials used to authenticate with OpenAI.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the image to generate.

n.title: Number of images
n.description: The number of images to generate.

response_format.title: Response Format
response_format.description: The format of the image to generate.
